description: This is a C++ header file defining a mock class for the IHdmiCecSource interface used in testing HDMI CEC source functionalities. It includes mock methods to simulate interactions with HDMI CEC sources and notifications.

classes.name: HdmiCecSourceMock
classes.description: Mock class for IHdmiCecSource interface, used for unit testing HDMI CEC source operations.

classes.name: HdmiCecSourceNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock class for IHdmiCecSource::INotification interface, used for testing notification callbacks related to HDMI CEC source events.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Mocks configuration of the HDMI CEC source with a service.

methods.name: GetActiveSourceStatus
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the active source status.

methods.name: GetEnabled
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of whether the source is enabled.

methods.name: GetOSDName
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the On-Screen Display name.

methods.name: GetOTPEnabled
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of OTP enabled status.

methods.name: GetVendorId
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the vendor ID.

methods.name: SendKeyPressEvent
methods.description: Mocks sending a key press event.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Mocks adding a reference (for reference counting).
